author: t.sickert@gmail.com (Torben Sickert) version: 1.0 stable

This plugin extends an html input field which serves a number to be given. Handling validation and easy incrementing or decrementing of given value is provided.

Classes

Incrementer

extends $.Tools.class

name {String} Holds the class name to provide inspection features.

_options {Object}

Saves default options for manipulating the Gui's behaviour.
